climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 100% NATURAL LINEN: EVERLY Linen table cloth is made of premium French grown flax, with antistatic and hypoallergenic effect, the tablecloths are friendly for allergies. Pair with our cloth napkins for the full effect

ELEGANT DECORATION: This Halloween tablecloth can perfectly match the kitchen or business decoration. Simple and generous linen color adds a rustic chic feeling to your dining table. Mid-weight breathable linen crafts a good dropping effect

VALUE PACK: You will get 60''W x 120''L table clothes for 6-foot rectangle tables, enough for 10-12 seat rectangle or oval table needs by better dropping effect. Please measure your table size and according to the size guiding chart before purchasing

VERSATILE OCCASIONS: As indoor table cover for dining table, coffee table. as an outdoor table cloth for weddings, restaurants, picnics tables, etc. Superior quality and fabulously look make it a perfect gift for Thanksgiving dinner or housewarming parties

CARE INSTRUCTION: Do not bleach, dry clean, or use detergent with chlorine. Machine wash cold separately with a gentle cycle. Low tumble dries or iron if needed. It is normal for some lint in the first few washes, regular washing will make linen table clothes softer

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: about us Part of our love for linen stems from its simplicity from the fact that it does its job quietly and efficiently for years and years, whilst also looking understatedly beautiful. A driving force behind EVERLY is our belief in the need to slow down, to avoid unnecessary clutter and fast fashion, to appreciate the little things that bring joy in our lives and our homes. It's clear we need wide-reaching svstemic change to limit temperature increases. But there are also things we can do as individuals to help protect the planet. As a company we're aiming for zero waste in our linen textiles production process. We also use green energy. And because linen is naturally as well as very durable, it's a brilliant sustainable fabric too.

about us Part of our love for linen stems from its simplicity from the fact that it does its job quietly and efficiently for years and years, whilst also looking understatedly beautiful. A driving force behind EVERLY is our belief in the need to slow down, to avoid unnecessary clutter and fast fashion, to appreciate the little things that bring joy in our lives and our homes. It's clear we need wide-reaching svstemic change to limit temperature increases. But there are also things we can do as individuals to help protect the planet. As a company we're aiming for zero waste in our linen textiles production process. We also use green energy. And because linen is naturally as well as very durable, it's a brilliant sustainable fabric too.

Linen Tablecloth The table is where we gather with friends and family to share meals, but also to share an experience. Ensure you set the perfect tone with a luxurious linen tablecloth from our collection. Our pure, natura tablecloths come in a wide range of colours and designs, so you can pick the right one for your home Whether you are looking for a graceful finish, a splash of colour or a softlv decadent backdrop, our tablecloth range is just what you need.

Dinner with Friends Apart from practical-only use, linen home textiles can turn your home into a stylish yet peaceful oasis. lt absorbs dies well, so various colours and patterns can be applied in order to satisfy even the most demanding customer. Christmas Dinner Linen is a natural product, coming from the delicate blue flax plant. Its naturalness is reflected in the gorgeous range of muted greys you'll find in undyed linens. These tones work beautifully in minimalist, calming interiors. And if you want something brighter linen takes really well to aves meaning you can get products in a huge range of shades. Thanksgiving Dinner Your table can be decorated in more than just white or green- choose colours that can be adapted al year round! Not only will you have a cosy and festive table for the holidays, but you'll also be making a more sustainable choice. Family Dinner We don't believe in hiding your table linens away for'best We think you should use your linen tablecloths, linen napkins and table runners whenever you can! Dinner with Friends Christmas Dinner Thanksgiving Dinner Family Dinner

Natural Product There are many reasons to love linen-likeits beauty strength, timeless style and comfort. But at this time of climate crisis the most important benefit of this amazing fabric is the fact that it can be sustainably produced and processed. More Durability When you buy good quality products for your home you not only surround yourself with beautiful things, you also help reduce waste. Cheaper disposable homewares often end up in landfill, whereas a linen tablecloth or linen bedlinen set will last for years. While there may be a bigger financial outlay in the first place, you will find you're actually saving money in the long run as you won't need to replace things as often. Linen has long been passed down as heirlooms through generations, showing just how much wear and use it can withstand. Machine Washing Thanks to the fact that linen washes well in machines and is tumble-dryable you don't need to worry about spills or stains. Our linen is machine washable and dries more quickly than cotton, which makes caring for your kitchen linens orlinen clothes really simple. In fact, they will get better with every wash.Instead, you can add a touch of laid-back elegance and easy charm to your table every day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXACTLY as described/shown~ Beautiful.
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful soft linen cloth @a fantastic price. The sheerness of the cloth is exactly as shown in the photos. The feel and look of the fabric is very "LUX" w/an effortless lux look on your table. Wrinkles? It IS Linen, expect it and get your iron/steamer out. I have not yet washed this cloth, but I absolutely would expect a little shrinkage if you're going to dry it, I'm not. If it doesn't shrink a little, I'll be pleasantly surprised. I'm getting another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Soft Powder Blue
reviews.reviewText: Terrible pic-this is just thrown over a barstool, but you can see the color against pure white. Quality is good and the color is the perfect soft powder blue. It is lighter than sky, warmer than ice and bluer than grey. Hope that helps. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As all linen, it shrinks at first so don’t order something too short. I really like the quality and the colors is true to the screen. I liked it so much that I ordered a second color which I rarely do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice linen tablecloth
reviews.reviewText: I liked this linen tablecloth. The linen has some weight to it and ironed up very nicely. Looked great on my holiday table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice table cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely inexpensive tablecloth
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely tablecloth that looks more expensive than it was. We wash and dry it with our regular laundry and it has held up well. Stains have been easy to remove so far. It comes out of the dryer softly wrinkled which gives it a nice casual feel for every day use; if you want a more formal look, I think it’d do well with ironing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great color and quality
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as described, it is a beautiful tablecloth and the color looked as photographed on the listing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice product.
reviews.reviewText: I would have. liked for it to be shipped in a box or envelope that was not see through. The only thing that kept the product from being tampered with was a clear plastic bag with a zipper.
